member.name: T:TPG.Maria.Internal.IMariaInternalLayer
member.summary: Internal interface for layers in Maria.
Creates the geo layer used by Maria.
member.param: Geo context used by Maria 2012 geo layer.
Geo navigator. Go forward and back between map center position and scale.
The UndoRedoStack to use in this layer.
Geo units setting. Format and unit of position, speed etc.

member.name: M:TPG.Maria.Internal.IMariaInternalLayer.SetUndoRedoStack(TPG.GeoFramework.Contracts.Presentation.IUndoRedoStack)
member.summary: Set the UndoRedo stack to use for this layer.

member.name: P:TPG.Maria.Internal.IMariaInternalLayer.GeoLayerViewModel
member.summary: Gives access to the already created geo layer. Will return null if layer still has not been created.
